Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class StudentsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.StudentsManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bag, Cloud, Island, SchoolEntrance, SchoolRoom, StudentsContainer
public abstract class StudentsManager extends Object
Lots of pieces and entities in the game keep memory of students, this class gets extended by all classes that manage students.
